India's T20 unit appears strong.

description: India secured an unassailable 2-1 series lead against Australia with a commanding 48-run victory in the fourth T20I. A disciplined bowling attack, spearheaded by Washington Sundar's exceptional death overs, stifled Australia's chase after they were set a target of 168. This win highlights India's composure and adaptability under captain Suryakumar Yadav.

ED attaches Raina, Dhawan's Rs 11.14cr assets - what we know so far
description: The Enforcement Directorate has provisionally attached assets worth Rs 11.14 crore belonging to former cricketers Suresh Raina and Shikhar Dhawan. The action stems from an investigation into the illegal offshore betting platform 1xBet, which promoted betting through surrogate brands. Both cricketers allegedly entered endorsement agreements with foreign entities to promote 1xBet, with payments channelled through foreign entities to conceal illicit origins.

description: Dhruv Jurel's unbeaten century was the highlight for India A on Day 1 against South Africa A, rescuing the team from a precarious 59/4. His resilient 132, including a vital partnership with Kuldeep Yadav, propelled India A to 255 all out. Jurel's performance underscores his growing reputation as a dependable middle-order batter.

IND vs AUS: Arshdeep's catch swings momentum in India's favour - Watch
description: Arshdeep Singh's spectacular catch to dismiss Australian skipper Mitchell Marsh proved a pivotal moment in India's hard-fought victory.  The athletic grab, following a clever slower ball from Shivam Dube, broke a dangerous partnership and reignited India's control. This brilliant fielding display underscored the team's improved standards under Suryakumar Yadav's captaincy, providing a crucial spark in a low-scoring encounter.

title: ' Criminal ... drunk!' Bihar dy CM, RJD leader hurl insults over convoy attack - watch
description: Bihar deputy CM Vijay Kumar Sinha and RJD MLC Ajay Kumar engaged in a heated exchange during the first phase of elections. Sinha alleged his convoy was attacked with cow dung, while Kumar accused Sinha of intimidating voters. Both leaders traded insults, with Sinha blaming Kumar's men for stopping their vehicle and engaging in hooliganism.

Banality of evil: German nurse kills 10 patients - to reduce workload
description: The court in Aachen called it a crime of “particular severity of guilt,” ensuring he will never walk free again. But what’s truly chilling is not just the scale of his actions — it’s their ordinariness. A man trained since 2007 to heal became, by 2024, an executioner in scrubs, armed not with malice but with indifference.

description: Amit Shah on Thursday took swipe at Rahul Gandhi and Lalu Prasad Yadav, accusing them of supporting infiltrators and warning of a return to 'jungle raj' if the opposition wins. Shah asserted the BJP-NDA's commitment to making Bihar 'infiltrator-free' and highlighted PM Modi's decisive action against terrorism, contrasting it with past Congress governments.

Police intervened, leading to a clash when some women tried to breach barricades. The group eventually performed prayers from a nearby lane, while authorities maintain the site's status is sub judice.

description: The Enforcement Directorate has attached assets worth over Rs 11 crore belonging to cricketers Suresh Raina and Shikhar Dhawan in a money-laundering probe linked to the betting platform 1xBet. Investigations are examining their endorsement deals and the platform's alleged user fraud and tax evasion. The ED's crackdown targets illegal betting apps nationwide.

description: Priyanka Chopra congratulated Zohran Mamdani on Instagram for becoming New York City’s youngest and first Muslim mayor. Son of filmmaker Mira Nair, Zohran made history at 34. Priyanka moved to New York in 2016, married Nick Jonas in 2018, and they now live there with their daughter Malti Marie.

description: The World Cup-winning Indian women's cricket team met President Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan, where captain Harmanpreet Kaur presented a signed team jersey. President Murmu congratulated the team on their historic achievement, emphasizing their role as inspiration and a reflection of a united India. The team also met Prime Minister Narendra Modi earlier.

description: Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda are reportedly planning a grand wedding. Following a private engagement last October, the couple is rumored to be tying the knot on February 26, 2026. Reports suggest a royal destination wedding in Udaipur. Fans eagerly await confirmation from the popular actors. Both stars have upcoming film projects.

description: Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Vijay Kumar Sinha accused RJD supporters of attacking his convoy and hurling stones and cow dung. The SP stated tensions arose upon Sinha's arrival.

description: The Madhya Pradesh high court dismissed a plea by Shah Bano Begum's daughter seeking to halt the release of the Bollywood film 'Haq'. description: A headless body of a woman was discovered floating in a drain near Sector 82 on Thursday afternoon. A sweeper alerted authorities after noticing the grim discovery around noon. Police have recovered the body and are currently working to ascertain the woman's identity.

description: President Trump claimed he brokered a ceasefire between India and Pakistan by linking it to trade deals, stating they agreed to peace after he threatened tariffs.  He asserted this intervention resolved eight wars during his tenure. However, India has consistently denied any US involvement in the truce.

title: ‘Perfume you can eat’: Mamdani’s 'Rajnigandha' moment just before NYC poll win— Watch
description: New York City mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's victory was amplified by a viral video of him casually consuming Rajnigandha, a popular Indian mouth freshener. The light-hearted clip, shared widely, resonated with Indian users who flooded social media with memes and celebratory comments, highlighting a cultural connection amidst his historic win.

description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg shared insights on generative AI and their entrepreneurial journeys. Huang humorously wished he'd dropped out of college like Zuckerberg, given Nvidia's long path to becoming a $5 trillion company.

title: Shohei Ohtani’s wife Mamiko Tanaka’s ‘marry my mom’ parade moment goes viral
description: Los Angeles erupted in joy as the Dodgers clinched the World Series. During the celebratory parade, a fan's "Marry my mom" sign brought laughter, even prompting Shohei Ohtani's wife, Mamiko Tanaka, to playfully cover his eyes. This heartwarming, viral moment highlighted the couple's charming dynamic amidst the team's historic triumph.

title: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes large donation; focus on education
description: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University $80 million, one of the largest single donations in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation continues Scott's recent pattern of substantial gifts to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.
